Main content start



 

 

 

Welcome to Stanford Career Education (CareerEd), formerly known as BEAM. We invite you to partner with us as you explore career options, search for a job or internship, network with alumni and employers, or change careers.
Learn more about CareerEd





 

 


 




 


 




 


 


 





 





 













Start exploring your options and what we have to offer.
Frosh/Soph
We are here to help you get hands-on experience during your frosh or sophomore year that will allow you to develop meaningful connections, gain valuable experience, and explore your career interests. Start exploring your options and what we have to offer.
Learn More








 













Prepare for your next opportunity and post-graduation plans.
Humanities & Sciences
Prepare for your next opportunity and post-graduation plans.Whether you know what you want to do post-Stanford or are unsure of where to start, we are here to help you wherever you are in your career journey.
Learn More








 













Prepare for your next opportunity and post-graduation plans.
Engineering & Earth
The Engineering and Earth team empowers engineering and earth students through classes, coaching, building community, and providing students with tools and connections to support their professional journey. 
Learn More







 





 













Explore and land opportunities within and outside of academia.
PhDs & Postdocs
We support career diversity, and we encourage you to imagine multiple possible futures. The PhD & Postdoc team supports PhD students and postdoctoral fellows in their pursuit of meaningful work across all industries. We help you consider the many paths available to you, and help you land the opportunities you find within and beyond academia. 
Learn More








 













Connect with us as you search for or pivot to different career opportunities. Get involved with mentoring or hiring Stanford students.
Alumni 
Whether you’re looking to advance your career or support current students, we offer a variety of opportunities to engage with us and Stanford after graduation.
Learn More








 













Attend career fairs to connect with employers and learn more about job and internship opportunities.
Career Fairs
Career Fairs are an excellent way to connect with employers to learn about job and internship opportunities along with the specific skills they are seeking. 
Learn More
